text: CO-STAR is an iterative innovation management methodology originating from silicon valley. The acronym stands for customer, opportunity, solution, team, advantages and results. It was introduced in a 2012 book by Laszlo Gyorffy and Lisa Friedman. The methodology is being used by several companies, for example by INNOArchitects, IdeaScale or the Swiss Post. == References == Category:Innovation Category:Management systems
title: CO-STAR
